name: Master Mind (nobleogre)
description:
MMind - Game inspired on Master Mind board game from 80's.

Try to break the code!

Check the tips pegs if you are getting close to break the code:

  • white peg - You got a right color
  • black peg - You got right color and position

Options for the classic 4 colors challenge and additionally  6 and  8 colors and still repeatable color.

Good Luck!!!
